#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

vector <int> v(100005,-1);

bool dfs(int x,int y)
{
    if(x==-1)
        return 0;
    else if(x==y)
        return 1;
    else
        dfs(v[x],y);
}

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0);
	int n,q,u,x,y,i;
	cin>>n>>q>>u;
	for(i=1;i<n;++i)
        {
        	cin>>x>>y;
        	v[y]=x;
    	}
    	while(q--)
    	{
        	cin>>x>>y;
        	if(dfs(x,y))
            		cout<<"1\n";
        	else if(dfs(y,x))
            		cout<<"-1\n";
        	else
            		cout<<"0\n";
    	}
    	return 0;
}
